annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: obligations without requiring that the contracting authority has recourse against the principal debtor (the contractor).
annotations.translation: 债务，但无须订约当局对主债务人（承包商）有追索权。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor bears the cost of providing such guarantee.
annotations.translation: 承包商承担提供此类担保的费用。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Pre-financing guarantees must remain in force until the pre-financing is cleared against interim payments or payment of the balance. Where the payment of the balance takes the form of a debit note, the pre-financing guarantee must remain in force for three months after the debit note is sent to the contractor. The contracting authority must release the guarantee within the following month.
annotations.translation: 预筹资金担保必须继续有效，直到预筹资金结清临时付款或余额为止。如果余额的支付采用借方通知单的形式，则预融资担保必须在借方通知单发送给承包商后三个月内仍然有效。订约当局必须在下个月内解除担保。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Performance guarantees cover compliance with substantial contractual obligations until the contracting authority has given its final approval for the service. The performance guarantee must not exceed 10 % of the total price of the specific contract. The contracting authority must release the guarantee fully after final approval of the service, as provided for in the specific contract.
annotations.translation: 履约保证包括遵守实质性合同义务，直至订约当局最后批准服务为止。履约保证不得超过具体合同总价的10%。订约当局必须按照具体合同的规定，在服务最后批准后完全解除担保。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Retention money guarantees cover full delivery of the service in accordance with the specific contract including during the contract liability period and until its final approval by the contracting authority. The retention money guarantee must not exceed 10% of the total price of the specific contract. The contracting authority must release the guarantee after the expiry of the contract liability period as provided for in the specific contract.
annotations.translation: 保固金担保涵盖根据特定合同完全交付服务，包括在合同责任期间直至订约当局最后批准服务为止。质保金担保不得超过具体合同总价的10%。订约当局必须在具体合同规定的合同责任期届满后解除担保。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contracting authority must not request a retention money guarantee for a specific contract where it has requested a performance guarantee.
annotations.translation: 订约当局不得为要求履约担保的具体合同申请留存款担保。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor (or leader in the case of a joint tender) must send an invoice for interim payment, as provided for in Article 1.6 or in the tender specifications or in the specific contract.
annotations.translation: 承包商（或联合投标中的牵头人）必须按照第 1.6 条或招标规范或具体合同的规定发送临时付款发票。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contractor (or leader in the case of a joint tender) must send an invoice for payment of the balance within 60 days of the end of the period of provision of the services, as provided for in Article 1.6, in the tender specifications or in the specific contract.
annotations.translation: 承包商（或联合招标的领导者）必须在提供服务期限结束后60天内发送发票，以支付余款，如第1.6条、招标规范或具体合同中的规定。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Payment of the invoice and approval of documents does not imply recognition of the regularity, authenticity, completeness and correctness of the declarations and information they contain.
annotations.translation: 支付发票和批准文件并不意味着承认其所包含的申报和信息的规律性、真实性、完整性和正确性。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Payment of the balance may take the form of recovery.
annotations.translation: 余额的支付可以采取追偿的形式。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contracting authority may suspend the payment periods specified in Article 1.6 at any time by notifying the contractor (or leader in the case of a joint tender) that its invoice cannot be processed. The reasons the contracting authority may cite for not being able to process an invoice are:
annotations.translation: 订约当局可随时通知承包者（或联合投标的牵头人）其发票无法处理，从而暂停第1.6条规定的付款期限。订约当局可以援引不能处理发票的原因是：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The contracting authority must notify the contractor (or leader in the case of joint tender) as soon as possible of any such suspension, giving the reasons for it. In cases b) and c) referred above, the contracting authority shall notify the contractor (or leader in case of a joint tender) the time limits to submit additional information or corrections or a new version of the documents or deliverables if the contracting authority requires it.
annotations.translation: 订约当局必须尽快通知承包商（或联合投标情况下的牵头人）任何此类暂停，并说明原因。在上述 b) 和 c) 的情况下，如果订约当局要求，订约当局应通知承包商（或联合投标的牵头人）提交附加信息或更正或新版本文件或可交付成果的时限。

annotations.label: Picture
annotations.text: image
annotations.translation: 图像

annotations.label: Picture
annotations.text: image
annotations.translation: 图像

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
annotations.translation: 欧洲工作安全与健康署

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EC-FWC services Dec 2018
annotations.translation: EC-FWC 服务 2018 年 12 月

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: Contract no: [complete]
annotations.translation: 合同编号：[完成]

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: II.21.6. Interim payments and payment of the balance
annotations.translation: II.21.6. 中期付款和余款支付

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: II.21.7. Suspension of the time allowed for payment
annotations.translation: II.21.7. 暂停付款时间

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: a) because it does not comply with the FWC;
annotations.translation: a) 因为它不符合 FWC；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: b) because the contractor has not produced the appropriate documents or deliverables; or
annotations.translation: b) 由于承包商没有提供适当的文件或可交付成果；或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: c) because the contracting authority has observations on the documents or deliverables submitted with the invoice.
annotations.translation: c) 因为订约当局对随发票提交的文件或可交付成果有意见。
